resources.string: 100 seconds, 43 presidents, 10 seconds per question. Each correct answer gives you 5 points plus additional points depending on time left for that question (3 seconds left = 3 additional points). Each wrong answer gives you -3 points. \n\nYou think you know the US presidents? Show your knowledge!
Are you sure you want to delete all high scores?
How cool is it to be the US history whiz?
Very cool, since knowledge is power!
Show off your talent with the US Finest.

You definitely need to take this Quiz if you are into the US presidents. The quiz enables you to test your knowledge about the US presidents and history overall, making you ready for bigger challenges.
Download US Finest Android app from Goole Play and try it!
